Sentencas: Applying protective coatings on metallic interconnects are being considered as the most effective approach to improve the metal endurance in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of (Mn,Co)3O4 spinel nano powder on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: The importance of a high green density to improve the sintered density and various properties of sintered ceramic materials is also well-known.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of (Mn,Co)3O4 spinel nano powder on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: In the present study, electrophoretic deposition (EPD) of (Mn,Co)(3)O-4 powder in iodine-added ethanol suspension was studied under constant voltage (50 V) and concentration (10 g.l(-1)).
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of (Mn,Co)3O4 spinel nano powder on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: The packing behavior of green layers was investigated during deposition.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of (Mn,Co)3O4 spinel nano powder on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: An increase in solid fraction participating in the coating layer was observed with deposition time, showing that the microstructure of the deposit becomes more close-packed when EPD is prolonged.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of (Mn,Co)3O4 spinel nano powder on SOFC metallic interconnects

Sentencas: A kinetic relation based on density-time proportionality was proposed regarding the mechanism of packing of particles during EPD.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of (Mn,Co)3O4 spinel nano powder on SOFC metallic interconnects
